    name: Making “Web mentions” look more conversational
    content: Now my social web interactions show up like a massive group chat.
      Replies and mentions of my posts show up in speech bubbles. Likes and
      reposts – and now also bookmarks – are no longer just counter up, but show
      up in the flow of the of other Webmentions.

That's creative! Don't forget to set the comment text color on dark mode too.
